author: simonw
msg: use supress codec rather than comparing codec names

author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-561.  Only download font packages if they aren't already there.  Committed on behalf of Alex Ott.

author: rpluem
msg: Fix potential data corruption in apr_brigade_write() and friends if
the last bucket of the brigade is a heap bucket that has been split,
and there are still references to the next part of the original bucket
